title: Review for 'COVID19usa'
description: This is the review for package 'COVID19usa', which contains the context and a check list.

title: Review for Shiny App on COVID-19 Analysis
description: This is the review for my previous shiny app on COVID-19 global analysis. In this review, I will introduce the content of my app , then show both where it's done well, where it's worth improving, and what I might add next time. Hope you can enjoy when reading!

title: COVID-19 analysis for Russia
description: Welcome to my new blog, this is the anlaysis of COVID-19 for Russia, mainly focusing on the region distribution, death rate and recovered rate. Hope it can help after you read it!

title: COVID-19 analysis for Ghana
description: Welcome to my new blog, this is the anlaysis of COVID-19 for Ghana, mainly focusing on exploring case numbers. Hope you can enjoy reading what I share and display!
